text: How do you disable coverage statistics in the common Github Actions CI script?

elements.text: How do you disable coverage statistics in the common Github Actions CI script?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/54735| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
Hey <@U69BL50BF>, if you were able to find an answer here on Slack, please cross post it to Discourse via the link above. Thank you!

<@U7THT3TM3> created these scripts:

<https://github.com/JuliaLinearAlgebra/Octavian.jl/blob/master/.github/workflows/ci.yml>

They run some tests with coverage enabled, and others with it disabled (code runs around 100x slower with coverage enabled, so testing everything with coverage just isn't practical).

elements.text: They run some tests with coverage enabled, and others with it disabled (code runs around 100x slower with coverage enabled, so testing everything with coverage just isn't practical).

text:
To disable coverage, the steps includes:
```        with:
          coverage: false```

elements.text: To disable coverage, the steps includes:

text:
To control turning tests on/off, <https://github.com/JuliaLinearAlgebra/Octavian.jl/blob/369aafe7621713798e7b4e7db3ab1cc16adca872/test/test_suite_preamble.jl#L8|it uses>:
```function is_coverage()
    return !iszero(Base.JLOptions().code_coverage)
end```
